ReportBundle.ReportXML: <Report ReportGID="7f0430ac-9f46-4fe6-b7c7-4d79ec9976ba" ReportUseType="2" ReportType="5" ReportName="Current Inventory Summary" Description="Current Inventory by Pounds/Tons" CreatedDT="2013-01-29T14:42:07" ModifiedDT="2014-05-19T15:00:32.647" ModifiedBy="VAS" ConcurrencyTS="AAAAAAAAJ1o=" ReportVersion="2" />

ReportQuery.ReportQueryText:
<QueryBundle> <QueryText>from o in ( from ing in Ingredients {false} let ingLocs = ing.InventoryItem.InventoryItemLocations .Where(iil => iil.Inactive == false & iil.InventoryItem.Inactive == false && iil.Location.Inactive == false) join pa in projectionAF on ing.InventoryItemGID equals pa.Key into pag join pd in projectionDM on ing.InventoryItemGID equals pd.Key into pdg from projAF in pag.DefaultIfEmpty() from projDM in pdg.DefaultIfEmpty() select new { CompanyName = ing.InventoryItem.Company.CompanyName, IngredientName = ing.InventoryItem.InventoryItemName, ing.InventoryItem.Description, ing.IngredientType.IngredientTypeName, HasTrackedLocations = ingLocs.Any(il => il.TrackingEnabled), IsPremix = ing.MadeByRecipeGID == Guid.Empty ? false : true, IsInUse = projAF == null ? false : true,
// DM% values (weighted averages) AsTestedDM_Pct = ingLocs.Any(il => il.AFQuantityOnHand > 0) ? ingLocs.Sum(il => il.AFQuantityOnHand > 0 ? il.AsTestedDMPct * il.AFQuantityOnHand : 0) / ingLocs.Sum(il => il.AFQuantityOnHand > 0 ? il.AFQuantityOnHand : 0) : ingLocs.Count() > 0 ? ingLocs.Average(il => il.AsTestedDMPct) : 0,
AsPurchasedDM_Pct = ingLocs.Any(il => il.AFQuantityOnHand > 0) ? ingLocs.Sum(il => il.AFQuantityOnHand > 0 ? il.AsPurchasedDMPct * il.AFQuantityOnHand : 0) / ingLocs.Sum(il => il.AFQuantityOnHand > 0 ? il.AFQuantityOnHand : 0) : ingLocs.Count() > 0 ? ingLocs.Average(il => il.AsTestedDMPct) : 0,
// On-hand values OnHandAF_MQty = ingLocs.Sum(il => il.AFQuantityOnHand), OnHandAF_LQty = ingLocs.Sum(il => il.AFQuantityOnHandLarge), OnHandDM_MQty = ingLocs.Sum(il => il.DMQuantityOnHand), OnHandDM_LQty = ingLocs.Sum(il => il.DMQuantityOnHandLarge),
OnHandValue = ingLocs.Sum(il => il.AFFifoCost),
OnHandAvgCostPerAF_MQty = ingLocs.Any(il => il.AFQuantityOnHand > 0) ? ingLocs.Sum(il => il.AFQuantityOnHand > 0 ? il.AFFifoCost : 0) / ingLocs.Sum(il => il.AFQuantityOnHand > 0 ? il.AFQuantityOnHand : 0) : ingLocs.Average (il => il.AFFifoCostPer),
OnHandAvgCostPerAF_LQty = ingLocs.Any(il => il.AFQuantityOnHand > 0) ? ingLocs.Sum(il => il.AFQuantityOnHandLarge > 0 ? il.AFFifoCost : 0) / ingLocs.Sum(il => il.AFQuantityOnHandLarge > 0 ? il.AFQuantityOnHandLarge : 0) : ingLocs.Count() > 0 ? ingLocs.Average(il => il.AFFifoCostPerLarge) : 0,
OnHandAvgCostPerDM_MQty = ingLocs.Any(il => il.DMQuantityOnHand > 0) ? ingLocs.Sum(il => il.DMQuantityOnHand > 0 ? il.DMFifoCost : 0) / ingLocs.Sum(il => il.DMQuantityOnHand > 0 ? il.DMQuantityOnHand : 0) : ingLocs.Count() > 0 ? ingLocs.Average(il => il.DMFifoCostPer) : 0,
OnHandAvgCostPerDM_LQty = ingLocs.Any(il => il.DMQuantityOnHand > 0) ? ingLocs.Sum(il => il.DMQuantityOnHandLarge > 0 ? il.DMFifoCost : 0) / ingLocs.Sum(il => il.DMQuantityOnHandLarge > 0 ? il.DMQuantityOnHandLarge : 0) : ingLocs.Count() > 0 ? ingLocs.Average(il => il.DMFifoCostPerLarge) : 0,
// Projected values ProjectedDaysLeft = projAF == null ? 0 : projAF.Sum(g => g.DaysLeft),
// -- Daily values ProjectedDailyAF_MQty = projAF == null ? 0 : projAF.Sum(pa => pa.DailyAmount), ProjectedDailyAF_LQty = projAF == null ? 0 : projAF.Sum(pa => pa.DailyTon), ProjectedDailyDM_MQty = projDM == null ? 0 : projDM.Sum(pd => pd.DailyAmount), ProjectedDailyDM_LQty = projDM == null ? 0 : projDM.Sum(pd => pd.DailyTon), // -- 30-day values Projected30DayAF_MQty = projAF == null ? 0 : projAF.Sum(pa => pa.Amount30Days), Projected30DayAF_LQty = projAF == null ? 0 : projAF.Sum(pa => pa.Ton30Days), Projected30DayDM_MQty = projDM == null ? 0 : projDM.Sum(pd => pd.Amount30Days), Projected30DayDM_LQty = projDM == null ? 0 : projDM.Sum(pd => pd.Ton30Days), // -- 60-day values Projected60DayAF_MQty = projAF == null ? 0 : projAF.Sum(pa => pa.Amount60Days), Projected60DayAF_LQty = projAF == null ? 0 : projAF.Sum(pa => pa.Ton60Days), Projected60DayDM_MQty = projDM == null ? 0 : projDM.Sum(pd => pd.Amount60Days), Projected60DayDM_LQty = projDM == null ? 0 : projDM.Sum(pd => pd.Ton60Days), // -- 90-day values Projected90DayAF_MQty = projAF == null ? 0 : projAF.Sum(pa => pa.Amount90Days), Projected90DayAF_LQty = projAF == null ? 0 : projAF.Sum(pa => pa.Ton90Days), Projected90DayDM_MQty = projDM == null ? 0 : projDM.Sum(pd => pd.Amount90Days), Projected90DayDM_LQty = projDM == null ? 0 : projDM.Sum(pd => pd.Ton90Days), // -- 120-day values Projected120DayAF_MQty = projAF == null ? 0 : projAF.Sum(pa => pa.Amount120Days), Projected120DayAF_LQty = projAF == null ? 0 : projAF.Sum(pa => pa.Ton120Days), Projected120DayDM_MQty = projDM == null ? 0 : projDM.Sum(pd => pd.Amount120Days), Projected120DayDM_LQty = projDM == null ? 0 : projDM.Sum(pd => pd.Ton120Days), // -- 180-day values Projected180DayAF_MQty = projAF == null ? 0 : projAF.Sum(pa => pa.Amount180Days), Projected180DayAF_LQty = projAF == null ? 0 : projAF.Sum(pa => pa.Ton180Days), Projected180DayDM_MQty = projDM == null ? 0 : projDM.Sum(pd => pd.Amount180Days), Projected180DayDM_LQty = projDM == null ? 0 : projDM.Sum(pd => pd.Ton180Days), // -- 365-day values Projected365DayAF_MQty = projAF == null ? 0 : projAF.Sum(pa => pa.Amount365Days), Projected365DayAF_LQty = projAF == null ? 0 : projAF.Sum(pa => pa.Ton365Days), Projected365DayDM_MQty = projDM == null ? 0 : projDM.Sum(pd => pd.Amount365Days), Projected365DayDM_LQty = projDM == null ? 0 : projDM.Sum(pd => pd.Ton365Days) } ) {where} select new { o.CompanyName, o.IngredientName, o.Description, o.IngredientTypeName, o.HasTrackedLocations, o.IsPremix, o.IsInUse,
o.AsPurchasedDM_Pct, o.AsTestedDM_Pct,
// On-hand values o.OnHandAF_MQty, o.OnHandAF_LQty, o.OnHandDM_MQty, o.OnHandDM_LQty, o.OnHandValue,
o.OnHandAvgCostPerAF_MQty, o.OnHandAvgCostPerAF_LQty, o.OnHandAvgCostPerDM_MQty, o.OnHandAvgCostPerDM_LQty,
// Projected values o.ProjectedDaysLeft,
// -- Daily o.ProjectedDailyAF_MQty, o.ProjectedDailyAF_LQty, o.ProjectedDailyDM_MQty, o.ProjectedDailyDM_LQty, // -- 30-day values o.Projected30DayAF_MQty, o.Projected30DayAF_LQty, o.Projected30DayDM_MQty, o.Projected30DayDM_LQty, // -- 60-day values o.Projected60DayAF_MQty, o.Projected60DayAF_LQty, o.Projected60DayDM_MQty, o.Projected60DayDM_LQty, // -- 90-day values o.Projected90DayAF_MQty, o.Projected90DayAF_LQty, o.Projected90DayDM_MQty, o.Projected90DayDM_LQty, // -- 120-day values o.Projected120DayAF_MQty, o.Projected120DayAF_LQty, o.Projected120DayDM_MQty, o.Projected120DayDM_LQty, // -- 180-day values o.Projected180DayAF_MQty, o.Projected180DayAF_LQty, o.Projected180DayDM_MQty, o.Projected180DayDM_LQty, // -- 365-day values o.Projected365DayAF_MQty, o.Projected365DayAF_LQty, o.Projected365DayDM_MQty, o.Projected365DayDM_LQty };</QueryText> <PreQueryText>var Ingredients = vas.FeedWatch.Model.Entities.IngredientFactory.Instance.GetAll(null) .Where(ing => ing.InventoryItem.Inactive == false);
var projectionAF = vas.FeedWatch.Model.Entities.InventoryProjection.GetInventoryProjections(false, false) .Where(il => il.InventoryItemLocation.Inactive == false && il.InventoryItemLocation.InventoryItem.Inactive == false && il.InventoryItemLocation.Location.Inactive == false) .GroupBy(il => il.InventoryItemLocation.InventoryItemGID);
var projectionDM = vas.FeedWatch.Model.Entities.InventoryProjection.GetInventoryProjections(false, true) .Where(il => il.InventoryItemLocation.Inactive == false && il.InventoryItemLocation.InventoryItem.Inactive == false && il.InventoryItemLocation.Location.Inactive == false) .GroupBy(il => il.InventoryItemLocation.InventoryItemGID);</PreQueryText> </QueryBundle>
